summary: 2 new armor sets, both Light and Heavy, based on the old mighty Viking Warrios the Berserkers
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center][font=Times New Roman]This mod add to your game 2 new armor sets, made by me, combining differents pieces of armor.
Inspired in Berserkers of the old Norse Sagas[/font]
[img]https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wMc86fPl8EE/VzTvRz_DaFI/AAAAAAAAAx8/LIV71HLUpIk2l-0fW4l2KLfXAA0veQGVQCLcB/s400/berserker_by_bakarov-d5dl5op.jpg[/img]﻿﻿[/center]
[/size]
[size=4]This is male only, I haven't made a proper female version and for now making it is not a priority for me, if someone want to make it and notice me is very welcome

The sets has the stasts of scaled and steelplate armour, because I dind't want to make something that you can get very early in game and use it for like 3 levels. You need the Advanced Smithing perk to craft the armors


My first custom armor, Enjoy :)[/size]
author: -SeeK-
